title: Designates the Langheinrich fossil quarry as the official home of the New York state fossil
summary: Designates the Langheinrich Fossil Quarry as the official home of the New York state fossil.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3839

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 28, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. BUTLER -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Governmental Operations

       AN  ACT to amend the state law, in relation to designating the Langhein-
         rich Fossil Quarry as the home of the New York state fossil

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 83 of the state law, as added by chapter 279 of the
    2  laws of 1984, is amended to read as follows:
    3    S 83. State  fossil.  The  Eurypterus  remipes  shall  be the official
    4  fossil of the state of New York,  AND  THE  LANGHEINRICH  FOSSIL  QUARRY
    5  SHALL BE THE OFFICIAL HOME OF THE NEW YORK STATE FOSSIL.
    6    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD08432-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state law, in relation to designating the Langheinrich Fossil Quarry as the home of the New York state fossil
